description:
A Londo Bell technical officer who supervises the development of the Nu Gundam, traveling back and forth between the Ra Cailum and Anaheim Electronics`s lunar factory to make sure that the construction of Amuro`s new mobile suit is progressing on schedule. Chan has strong feelings for Amuro, and is concerned about Anaheim`s last-minute addition of the psyco-frame to his Nu Gundam. As a result, she keeps a T-shaped sample of this exotic material with her for further study.
Source: Official Site
name: Chan Agi
